title: China Pledges Another $51 Billion For Debt-Distressed Africa - A Debt Trap?
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping today pledged to step up China's support across the debt-distressed African continent with funding of nearly $51 billion, backing for more infrastructure initiatives and a promise to create at least 1 million jobs.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping today pledged to step up China's support across the debt-distressed African continent with funding of nearly $51 billion, backing for more infrastructure initiatives and a promise to create at least 1 million jobs.

title: After Bet On 'Black Myth: Wukong' Pays Off, Chinese Investor's Next Plan
content: Black Myth: Wukong has sold 18 million copies in two weeks - one of the fastest starts the global gaming industry has seen. That record pace has in turn minted millions for its earliest and biggest investor.
summary: Black Myth: Wukong has sold 18 million copies in two weeks - one of the fastest starts the global gaming industry has seen. That record pace has in turn minted millions for its earliest and biggest investor.

title: US School Shooter Attempted To Enter Class, Was Denied Entry By Classmate
content: Colt Gray left the room at the start of the period but returned near the end, asking to be let back in, recounted a junior who sat next to Gray in class.
summary: Colt Gray left the room at the start of the period but returned near the end, asking to be let back in, recounted a junior who sat next to Gray in class.

title: India To Soon Top China Among Emerging Global Markets: Morgan Stanley
content: India is likely to soon overtake China as the most influential in a key emerging markets index, pulling in more foreign funds and adding fuel to a stock market rally that is "only past the halfway mark", Morgan Stanley said.
summary: India is likely to soon overtake China as the most influential in a key emerging markets index, pulling in more foreign funds and adding fuel to a stock market rally that is "only past the halfway mark", Morgan Stanley said.

title: Ugandan Olympian And Athlete Dies After Being Set On Fire By Ex-Boyfriend
content: Ugandan marathon runner Rebecca Cheptegei, who competed in the recent Paris Olympics, has died days after an ex-boyfriend threw petrol and set her ablaze.
summary: Ugandan marathon runner Rebecca Cheptegei, who competed in the recent Paris Olympics, has died days after an ex-boyfriend threw petrol and set her ablaze.

title: US Man Pays Over Rs 1.5 Lakh A Month In Rent To Live With 23 Roommates
content: A 33-year-old Sri Lankan native, who moved to New York from London in 2022, recently opened up about his living situation in Brooklyn's communal building, where he shares his home with more than two dozen people and pays a staggering $2,100 per month
summary: A 33-year-old Sri Lankan native, who moved to New York from London in 2022, recently opened up about his living situation in Brooklyn's communal building, where he shares his home with more than two dozen people and pays a staggering $2,100 per month

title: OpenAI Co-Founder Sutskever's New Safety-Focused AI Startup SSI Raises $1 billion
content: The Company currently has 10 employees and plans to use funds to acquire computing power and hire top talent. It will focus on building a small highly trusted team of researchers and engineers split between Palo Alto, California and Tel Aviv, Israe

title: Nvidia Did Not Receive A US Justice Department Subpoena, Spokesperson Says
content: Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday the Justice Department had sent a subpoena related to a potential antitrust investigation. The Justice Department did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
summary: Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday the Justice Department had sent a subpoena related to a potential antitrust investigation. The Justice Department did not immediately respond to a request for comment.

title: New Research Proves Cats To Be As Playful Companions As Dogs
content: Many people have seen dogs fetch, but cats like to get into the game too. Despite their very different hunting and play styles, fetching appears to combine elements of predatory and social behaviour for both species.
summary: Many people have seen dogs fetch, but cats like to get into the game too. Despite their very different hunting and play styles, fetching appears to combine elements of predatory and social behaviour for both species.

title: Australia Plans AI Rules On Human Oversight, Transparency
content: The report containing the guidelines said it was critical to enable human control as required across an AI system's lifecycle.

title: Know About New Zealand's Second-Ever Maori QueenÂ
content: Nga Wai Hono i te po Paki was anointed as the new Maori Queen, succeeding her father, King Tuheitia Pootatau Te Wherowhero VII, who died last week.
summary: Nga Wai Hono i te po Paki was anointed as the new Maori Queen, succeeding her father, King Tuheitia Pootatau Te Wherowhero VII, who died last week.

title: AI Safety, AI Regulation, AI Standards: US, Britain, EU To Sign First International Treaty On AI Standards, FT Reports
content: The three would sign the Council of Europe's convention on AI on Thursday, the newspaper said, adding that the convention was drafted for over two years by more than 50 countries
summary: The three would sign the Council of Europe's convention on AI on Thursday, the newspaper said, adding that the convention was drafted for over two years by more than 50 countries

title: New Zealand's Maori Crown 27-Year-Old Queen After Her Father's Death
content: Twenty-seven-year-old Nga Wai hono i te po was Thursday anointed as the new monarch by Maori chiefs in New Zealand. The decision came after the death of King Kiingi Tuheitia Ptatau Te Wherowhero VII.
summary: Twenty-seven-year-old Nga Wai hono i te po was Thursday anointed as the new monarch by Maori chiefs in New Zealand. The decision came after the death of King Kiingi Tuheitia Ptatau Te Wherowhero VII.

title: "I'm Going To Let Her Talk": Donald Trump On Debate With Kamala Harris
content: Donald Trump said he plans to allow his opponent, Kamala Harris, to speak without interruption during their presidential debate next week, a shift for the reality-television-star-turned-politician who built a career on combative exchanges.
summary: Donald Trump said he plans to allow his opponent, Kamala Harris, to speak without interruption during their presidential debate next week, a shift for the reality-television-star-turned-politician who built a career on combative exchanges.

title: Scientists Propose Licking Ice Lollies In Primary School Science Curriculum
content: A group of scientists, including people from the Royal Society of Chemistry, recently proposed that experiences such as licking an ice lolly should be part of the science curriculum.
summary: A group of scientists, including people from the Royal Society of Chemistry, recently proposed that experiences such as licking an ice lolly should be part of the science curriculum.

title: Setback For Canada's Trudeau As Key Ally Jagmeet Singh Pulls Support
content: In a major setback to Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, key ally Jagmeet Singh's New Democratic Party has pulled out support for his minority Liberal government ahead of the general election next year.
summary: In a major setback to Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, key ally Jagmeet Singh's New Democratic Party has pulled out support for his minority Liberal government ahead of the general election next year.

title: 4 Killed By Teen Shooter At US School: What We Know So Far
content: The shooter was armed with an AR-15, a semi-automatic rifle commonly used in many mass shootings across the US.

title: All About "Alaska Triangle" Where Over 20,000 People Mysteriously Vanished
content: The Bermuda Triangle is a region in the Atlantic Ocean notorious for mysterious disappearance. However, did you know about the so-called "Alaska Triangle", an area that has more unsolved missing person cases than anywhere else in the world?
summary: The Bermuda Triangle is a region in the Atlantic Ocean notorious for mysterious disappearance. However, did you know about the so-called "Alaska Triangle", an area that has more unsolved missing person cases than anywhere else in the world?

title: FBI Had Alerted Cops Of Teen Who Shot Dead 4 At US School
content: The 14-year-old student who killed four of his schoolmates in US's Georgia was questioned last year by police about online threats, the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) said.
summary: The 14-year-old student who killed four of his schoolmates in US's Georgia was questioned last year by police about online threats, the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) said.

title: Made By Astronauts For Astronauts, Boeing Starliner To Return Without Them
content: The Boeing Starliner on which Indian-origin NASA astronaut Sunita Williams flew to ISS on June 5 was touted as a space capsule made by astronauts for astronauts but, much to the embarrassment of Boeing, is now set to return without any humans.
summary: The Boeing Starliner on which Indian-origin NASA astronaut Sunita Williams flew to ISS on June 5 was touted as a space capsule made by astronauts for astronauts but, much to the embarrassment of Boeing, is now set to return without any humans.
